issues: Some text may be difficult to read due to low contrast against the background.
Text boxes could be more right-aligned.
Icons are generally well-placed, but could be evaluated for improved alignment.
Some elements appear slightly cramped in certain areas.

slides.summary: The slide is well-structured with minor issues related to text visibility and spacing.
recommendations: Increase contrast for text to enhance readability.
Consider further adjustments to the alignment of text boxes to adhere closely to RTL standards.
Ensure consistent spacing to avoid cramped visuals.
